text.div:
MedicationPrescriptionStatus

A code specifying the state of the prescribing event. Describes the lifecycle of the prescription.

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-prescription-status, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
active ActiveThe prescription is 'actionable', but not all actions that are implied by it have occurred yet.
on-hold On HoldActions implied by the prescription have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended".
completed CompletedAll actions that are implied by the prescription have occurred (this will rarely be made explicit).
entered-in-error Entered In ErrorThe prescription was entered in error and therefore nullified.
stopped StoppedActions implied by the prescription have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.
superseded SupersededThe prescription was replaced by a newer one, which encompasses all the information in the previous one.
draft DraftThe prescription is not yet 'actionable', i.e. it is a work in progress, required sign-off, need to be run through decision support.

name: MedicationPrescriptionStatus
description: A code specifying the state of the prescribing event. Describes the lifecycle of the prescription.

concept.definition: The prescription is 'actionable', but not all actions that are implied by it have occurred yet.
Actions implied by the prescription have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later.  May also be called "suspended".
All actions that are implied by the prescription have occurred (this will rarely be made explicit).
The prescription was entered in error and therefore nullified.
Actions implied by the prescription have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.
The prescription was replaced by a newer one, which encompasses all the information in the previous one.
The prescription is not yet 'actionable', i.e. it is a work in progress, required sign-off, need to be run through decision support.
